message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a steal! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique.
Alice, thanks for the offer. That product looks great, but the price is a little high for me right now. Would you consider $11,000?
I understand you think the price is a bit high, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $13,000. It's a fair price considering the value it brings to the table.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. How about we settle on $11,500? That's a fair compromise.
I'm glad you're willing to compromise, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500. It's still a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
Alice, I'm getting close to my budget limit.  I can do $12,000, but that's really the best I can offer.

I understand you're getting close to your budget limit, Bob. However, I'm still confident that this product is worth more to you than that. I'm willing to meet you at $13,000, but I think you'll see the value in it and be willing to go a bit higher. Let's aim for $13,250.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm afraid we're just too far apart.  $12,200 is my absolute final offer. If you can't accept that, I'll unfortunately have to explore other options.

I understand you've made your final offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to accept $12,200. I think the product is worth more than that, and I'm willing to give you one last chance to meet me in the middle. I'll counter with $13,000, and that's my final offer.
